game.name: A Recipe for Survival - Cat Cooking Roguelike Deckbuilder
game.shortDescription: Use two decks of cards to serve food to your customers during the day! Then fight them off when they turn to monsters at night in this fun and unique deckbuilding roguelike!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Use two decks of cards to serve food to your customers during the day! Then fight them off when they turn to monsters at night in this fun and unique deckbuilding roguelike!
